shortDescription: Linksys WAP54Gv3 firmware 3.04.03 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in the (1) data2 and (2) data3 parameters to (a) Debug_command_page.asp and (b) debug.cgi.
vulnerabilityName: linksys wap54gv3 Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
